project.name: MapComplete Open Shop Map
project.description: An editable map with basic shop information

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Open Shop Map has a layer Shop showing features with this tag

The layer 'Shop allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Shop allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Shop allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Shop allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'Shop' shows and asks freeform values for key 'name' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows and asks freeform values for key 'shop' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows shop=convenience with a fixed text, namely 'Convenience store' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows shop=supermarket with a fixed text, namely 'Supermarket' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows shop=clothes with a fixed text, namely 'Clothing store' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows shop=hairdresser with a fixed text, namely 'Hairdresser' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows shop=bakery with a fixed text, namely 'Bakery' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows shop=car_repair with a fixed text, namely 'Car repair (garage)' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows shop=car with a fixed text, namely 'Car dealer' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows and asks freeform values for key 'phone' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows and asks freeform values for key 'website' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows and asks freeform values for key 'email' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
Layer 'Shop' shows and asks freeform values for key 'opening_hours' (in the MapComplete.osm.be theme 'Open Shop Map')
